conbody.p: Pageflow Designer is a customized GMF (Graphical Modeling Framework) generated diagram editor with more intuitive editor features to create/edit/view pageflow models. The Pageflow Designer is build using the Graphical Modeling Framework (GMF) which provides a generative component and runtime infrastructure for developing graphical editors, which is based on Eclipse Modeling Framework (EMF) and Graphical Editing Framework (GEF). GMF binds the capabilities of both EMF and GEF and provides significant out of the box diagramming capabilties and also provides a service layer designed for extensibility.
conbody.section:
GMF Reusable Components The Pageflow Designer derives the following features from the GMF runtime
Direct Text Editing
Action Bars
Connection Handles
Collapsible Compartments
Ruler and grid Support
Shape Appearance Properties
Connection Appearance Properties
Common Diagram Toolbar
Common Diagram Menu and Popup Menu
Toolbar Select/Arrange/Align Group
Size and Animated Zoom
Printing Support
Saving Diagram to image (many formats)
Clipboard support
In addition to the featuers derived from GMF, the Pageflow Designer is customized a lot to provide more intuitve features, following is the list of custom features
Custom Tabbed Properties
Simplified model creation wizards
Custom model definition/edition Dialogs
Integration of Page models
Drag n Drop support of Page models and other pageflow models from navigator view
Custom Figures and appearance
The pageflow designer also providers capabilities like model compare, model search by extending the EMF tools Frameworks
